parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.38

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Gets all custom materials associated with the object.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getObjectMaterials''' obj

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> obj: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] of [[String]]s - array of materials

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_materials = [[getObjectMaterials]] car;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setObjectMaterial]], [[setObjectTextureGlobal]], [[getObjectTextures]], [[setObjectTexture]], [[setObjectMaterialGlobal]]
</value></part></template></root>
